summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.8°C) and outside temperature (down 2.4°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 750 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1449 m), feels like temperature (up 5.7°C), outside temperature (up 4.0°C), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. A few light raindrops may fall, occasional overcast conditions, and it’s dark. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
